origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'BankLoan.get_interest_rate', 'description': 'Get the current interest rate for a specific type of loan.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'loan_type', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the type of loan, e.g., fitness_club, car, home'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'interest_rate', 'description': 'the current interest rate for the specified loan type'}]}, {'name': 'CreditScore.get_score', 'description': 'Get the credit score of an individual.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'user_id', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the unique identifier of the user'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'credit_score', 'description': 'the credit score of the user'}]}, {'name': 'LoanCalculator.calculate_monthly_payment', 'description': 'Calculate the monthly payment for a loan based on the loan amount, interest rate, and loan term.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'loan_amount', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the total amount of the loan'}, {'name': 'interest_rate', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the annual interest rate of the loan'}, {'name': 'loan_term', 'type': 'INT', 'description': 'the term of the loan in months'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'monthly_payment', 'description': 'the calculated monthly payment for the loan'}]}, {'name': 'LoanApplication.submit_application', 'description': 'Submit a loan application and get the approval status.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'user_id', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the unique identifier of the user'}, {'name': 'loan_amount', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the total amount of the loan'}, {'name': 'loan_type', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the type of loan, e.g., fitness_club, car, home'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'approval_status', 'description': 'the status of the loan application, e.g., approved, pending, rejected'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我想申请一笔健身俱乐部贷款，首先，我需要了解当前的健身俱乐部贷款利率。然后，我需要查询我的信用评分，以确定我是否有资格申请贷款。接着，我需要计算我每月可以负担的还款金额。最后，我需要提交贷款申请并获取审批结果。当前这一步的目标是什么?
了解当前的健身俱乐部贷款利率
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'loan_type'的值是什么?

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'interest_rate': '5.25%'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
